hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
echo "set workspace for building up anchor5 'peripheral-io' package" if [ ! -d tizen_anchor5 ]; then mkdir ./tizen_anchor5 fi
cp /root/samples/anchor5/gbsAnchor5.conf ./tizen_anchor5/
cp /root/samples/anchor5/tizen-unified_iot-headed-3parts-armv7l-artik530.ks ./tizen_anchor5/

echo "clone and checkout 'peripheral-io' package"
cd ./tizen_anchor5
git clone ssh://review.tizen.org/platform/core/api/peripheral-io
cd peripheral-io
git checkout -b tizen-port 70dcc13c092288d06b6bb6255756f26ffd07b0fb

echo "'peripheral-io' package build"
cd ./tizen_anchor5
gbs -c ./gbsAnchor5.conf build -A armv7l --thread=4
mic cr loop tizen-unified_iot-headed-3parts-armv7l-artik530.ks --pack-to=tizen-unified_iot-headed-3parts-armv7l-artik530.tar.gz --logfile=mic_build.log -A armv7l
